refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: mftraining takes a list of .tr files, from which it generates the files inttemp (the shape prototypes) and pffmtable (the number of expected features for each character). (A third file called Microfeat is also written by this program, but it is not used.)

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.simpara: -U FILE The unicharset generated by unicharset_extractor
-O FILE The output unicharset that will be given to combine_tessdata.
